A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful cinematography\, interesting vistas\, amazing costumes\, and sound. Some plot holes\, but I'd say one of the top 3 SW flicks. That's the short of it. Mainly I want to address all the negative reviews that revolve around \"WAH! The male heroes are weak! The women are too powerful!\": Grow up\, grow a pair\, and y'all won't be so triggered! It's time things were a bit more balanced. Geek culture (and cinema) is not only for the \"dudes.\"
